# rsa-pop-quiz
Class, take your seats! It's PRIME-time for a quiz... `nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 58617`

#### Hints
- [RSA info](https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSA_algorithm)

### Solution
```bash
]
└─$ python3
Python 3.10.7 (main, Sep  8 2022, 14:34:29) [GCC 12.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> 60413 * 76753
4636878989
>>> n = 4636878989
>>> 5051846941 / 54269
93089.0
>>> (66347 - 1) * (12611 - 1)
836623060
>>> (66347 -1)*(12611-1)
836623060
>>> m = 6357294171489311547190987615544575133581967886499484091352661406414044440475205342882841236357665973431462491355089413710392273380203038793241564304774271529108729717
>>> e = 3
>>> n = 
>>> pow(m,e,n)

>>> q = 
>>> p = 
>>> e = 65537
>>> tn = (p-1)*(q-1)
>>> tn

>>> from Crypto.Util.number import inverse
>>> d = inverse(e,tn)
>>> d

```

A partir de aqui no puedo avanzar
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 
p : 
e : 65537
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
d
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):y
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
d: 
Well, yes, but actually no.
My disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined :(
```
